text: As the hart [strongs id="h354" /] panteth [strongs id="h6165" tvm="8799" /] after the water [strongs id="h4325" /] brooks [strongs id="h650" /], so panteth [strongs id="h6165" tvm="8799" /] my soul [strongs id="h5315" /] after thee, O God [strongs id="h430" /].

I will say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /] unto God [strongs id="h410" /] my rock [strongs id="h5553" /], Why hast thou forgotten [strongs id="h7911" tvm="8804" /] me? why go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] I mourning [strongs id="h6937" tvm="8802" /] because of the oppression [strongs id="h3906" /] of the enemy [strongs id="h341" tvm="8802" /]?

Judge [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8798" /] me, O God [strongs id="h430" /], and plead [strongs id="h7378" tvm="8798" /] my cause [strongs id="h7379" /] against an ungodly [strongs id="h3808" /] [strongs id="h2623" /] nation [strongs id="h1471" /]: O deliver [strongs id="h6403" tvm="8762" /] me from the deceitful [strongs id="h4820" /] and unjust [strongs id="h5766" /] man [strongs id="h376" /].

text: We have heard [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8804" /] with our ears [strongs id="h241" /], O God [strongs id="h430" /], our fathers [strongs id="h1" /] have told [strongs id="h5608" tvm="8765" /] us, [what] work [strongs id="h6467" /] thou didst [strongs id="h6466" tvm="8804" /] in their days [strongs id="h3117" /], in the times [strongs id="h3117" /] of old [strongs id="h6924" /].

[How] thou didst drive out [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8689" /] the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /] with thy hand [strongs id="h3027" /], and plantedst [strongs id="h5193" tvm="8799" /] them; [how] thou didst afflict [strongs id="h7489" tvm="8686" /] the people [strongs id="h3816" /], and cast them out [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8762" /].

Through thee will we push down [strongs id="h5055" tvm="8762" /] our enemies [strongs id="h6862" /]: through thy name [strongs id="h8034" /] will we tread them under [strongs id="h947" tvm="8799" /] that rise up [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8801" /] against us.

But thou hast saved [strongs id="h3467" tvm="8689" /] us from our enemies [strongs id="h6862" /], and hast put them to shame [strongs id="h954" tvm="8689" /] that hated [strongs id="h8130" tvm="8764" /] us.

But [strongs id="h637" /] thou hast cast off [strongs id="h2186" tvm="8804" /], and put us to shame [strongs id="h3637" tvm="8686" /]; and goest not forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /] with our armies [strongs id="h6635" /].

All this is come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8804" /] upon us; yet have we not forgotten [strongs id="h7911" tvm="8804" /] thee, neither have we dealt falsely [strongs id="h8266" tvm="8765" /] in thy covenant [strongs id="h1285" /].

Shall not God [strongs id="h430" /] search this out [strongs id="h2713" tvm="8799" /]? for he knoweth [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8802" /] the secrets [strongs id="h8587" /] of the heart [strongs id="h3820" /].

text: My heart [strongs id="h3820" /] is inditing [strongs id="h7370" tvm="8804" /] a good [strongs id="h2896" /] matter [strongs id="h1697" /]: I speak [strongs id="h559" tvm="8802" /] of the things which I have made [strongs id="h4639" /] touching the king [strongs id="h4428" /]: my tongue [strongs id="h3956" /] [is] the pen [strongs id="h5842" /] of a ready [strongs id="h4106" /] writer [strongs id="h5608" tvm="8802" /].
